section.name: General
section.p: Keep up to date with the latest events in the HiveMind world.

subsection.name: First alpha release of HiveMind 2
subsection.p: A public alpha version of HiveMind 2 is available. It is available via the Maven repository or from the HiveMind download page. First documentation is available on the new wiki.

subsection.name: New Site
subsection.p: The HiveMind site has experienced a major redesign as preparation for the oncoming first release of HiveMind 2

subsection.name: HiveMind - Now Top Level
subsection.p: HiveMind is now a top-level Apache project. The new home page is http://hivemind.apache.org.
